description: This Java source file defines Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) related to authentication endpoints, including classes for registration, login, token response, and refresh token requests.

classes.name: AuthDtos
classes.description: Container class for various authentication-related DTOs.

classes.name: AuthDtos.RegisterRequest
classes.description: DTO for user registration request, including email, password, and full name.

classes.name: AuthDtos.LoginRequest
classes.description: DTO for user login request, including email and password.

classes.name: AuthDtos.TokenResponse
classes.description: DTO representing the response containing access token, token type, and expiry duration.

classes.name: AuthDtos.RefreshRequest
classes.description: DTO for refresh token request containing a token string.

methods.name: AuthDtos.TokenResponse
methods.description: Constructor initializing access token and expiry duration.
